What it is: Embodies the symbolic force that travels with you during spiritual emptiness.
How to use it: Describe your experience of emptiness. Ask AI to summon a mythic being who walks with you.
What it changes: Gives presence and meaning to existential darkness.

What it is: Creates a symbolic practice to slow or bend perceived time.
How to use it: Describe where time feels out of control. Ask AI for a ritual that reorients time perception.
What it changes: Restores psychological control over time experience.

What it is: Generates an archetype that honors grief you weren’t allowed to express.
How to use it: Describe a loss that was dismissed. Ask AI to summon a mythic witness to validate it.
What it changes: Heals grief that was invalidated by others.

What it is: Stages a symbolic meeting with the part of you that lived through a prior transformation.
How to use it: Name a version of you that changed. Ask AI to recreate them for a ritual dialogue.
What it changes: Recovers wisdom from past growth episodes.

What it is: Designs a sacred ritual for falling apart on purpose.
How to use it: Describe where you’re holding too much. Ask AI to design a symbolic surrender collapse.
What it changes: Allows safe disintegration as a sacred act.

What it is: Digs into the symbolic layers beneath a recurring behavior.
How to use it: Name the behavior. Ask AI to excavate its symbolic roots layer by layer.
What it changes: Reveals subconscious beliefs governing conscious action.

What it is: Symbolically returns a family legacy or trauma you no longer wish to carry.
How to use it: Describe the inheritance. Ask AI for a return ceremony.
What it changes: Ends ancestral entanglement through symbolic closure.

What it is: Identifies symbolic forces, habits, or people draining your energy.
How to use it: Describe fatigue. Ask AI to scan for parasitic symbols and name their form.
What it changes: Increases sovereignty over your energy field.

What it is: Stages a ritual in which your enemy or fear becomes your teacher.
How to use it: Describe a trigger. Ask AI to transform it into a symbolic instructor.

What it is: Gathers symbolic remnants of lost love and recombines them into wholeness.
How to use it: Describe the breakup. Ask AI to retrieve symbolic love shards and reassemble them.
What it changes: Restores your capacity to love with symbolic integrity.
